A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think the movie is dramatically underrated\, obviously not by critics but by the general audience. I found that the movie had some incredible action and effects(which some were saying there wasn't enough of)\, but also succeeded in not having to heavily rely one bit on a flashy fight scenes. It stayed true to the franchise with constant twists and turns with well thought out storytelling\,  and what I was most worried about\, did not end up being just a remake of the empire strikes back.
